name: Blendy One Remake + ENG-version
description: Blendy is an animated toy that wants to kill. Its first victim was a resident of the Russian Federation Nikolai Umnikov. But will his victim be able to escape from the sharp hands of Blendy? Or die a painful death... Blendy One Remake is a remake of the first part of Blendy. Fixed a few bugs and made your wishes. Blendy has become even smarter! Keys now appear in random places! If you are not afraid in the first part, then try to play this!  VK
